# <a name="export-contacts"></a><span data-ttu-id="71e21-102">匯出連絡人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71e21-102">Export contacts</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="71e21-103">在頁面底部，選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71e21-103">At the bottom of the page, select the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="71e21-104">**人員**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71e21-104">**People**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="71e21-105">在工具列上，選取 [**管理** > **匯出連絡人**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71e21-105">On the toolbar, select **Manage** > **Export contacts**.</span></span> 
3. <span data-ttu-id="71e21-106">選擇 [所有連絡人] 或 [只有連絡人都匯出特定資料夾而言，然後選取 [**都匯出**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71e21-106">Choose to export all contacts or only contacts from a specific folder, and then select **Export**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="71e21-107">在頁面底部，選取 [預設的下載項目] 資料夾中的 [**儲存**] 以儲存 「 contacts.csv 」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71e21-107">At the bottom of the page, select **Save** to save "contacts.csv" in your default Downloads folder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="71e21-108">或者，選取 [**儲存**] 旁的箭號，然後選取 [**另存為**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71e21-108">Or, select the arrow next to **Save** and select **Save as**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71e21-109">若要深入了解，請參閱[從 Outlook 連絡人匯出](https://support.office.com/article/10f09abd-643c-4495-bb80-543714eca73f#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71e21-109">To learn more, see [Export contacts from Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/10f09abd-643c-4495-bb80-543714eca73f#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web).</span></span>
